snippet: The skill required to execute the attacks convinced American officials that Iran was behind them, likely in retaliation for economic sanctions and online attacks by the United States.
abstract: Government officials and security researchers say that skill level required to execute dozens of attacks to online banking sites convinced them that Iran was behind them, likely in retaliation for economic sanctions and attacks by the United States.

byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and QUENTIN HARDY

lead_paragraph: The skill required to execute the attacks convinced American officials that Iran was behind them, likely in retaliation for economic sanctions and online attacks by the United States.

headline.seo: Online Banking Attacks Were Work of Iran, U.S. Officials Say
headline.main: Bank Hacking Was the Work of Iranians, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Bank Hacks Were Work Of Iranians, Officials Say
